creator: John Hudson
trademark: Slabo is a trademark of Tiro Typeworks Ltd..
license_desciption: This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
description: Slabo is a collection of size-specific fonts for use in online advertising and other web uses. The collection currently includes this font, Slabo 27px, and Slabo 13px. Each font in the collection is fine-tuned for use at the pixel size in its name. The Slabo project is led by Tiro Typeworks, a type design foundry based in Canada. To contribute, see Slabo on GitHub.
